text:
After some investigation with the CVS version, it looks like 

        String path = req.getPathInfo();

in doGet returns null.  Since the path is null a NPE is raised in the
URIMapper:parse method (btw shouldn't this class be located in the server package?).
creator: vladimir@bossicard.com
dr.klemens.waldhoer@waldhor.com
text:
Hi,

Thanks ! That what I found too after inspecting the code. What's not clear to 
me where the db directory has to be located. Could it be that is the reason 
for the bug in doGet if the system does not find the db directory?

I tried to create a db in various places but this had no effect.

Klemens
